stories.title: Create and Manage Courses
stories.description: As an instructor, I want to create and manage courses so that I can offer structured learning content.

stories.title: Organize Lessons in Courses
stories.description: As an instructor, I want to organize lessons within courses so that learners can follow a logical sequence.

stories.title: Support Video/Text Content
stories.description: As an instructor, I want to add video and text content to lessons so that I can deliver engaging material.

stories.title: Create Quizzes with Multiple Types
stories.description: As an instructor, I want to create quizzes with multiple question types so that I can assess learner understanding.

stories.title: Auto-grade Quizzes
stories.description: As a learner, I want quizzes to be auto-graded so that I get immediate feedback on my performance.

stories.title: Track Course Progress
stories.description: As a learner, I want my progress per course tracked so that I can see how much I've completed.

stories.title: Mark Lessons as Complete
stories.description: As a learner, I want to mark lessons as complete so that I can track my advancement.

stories.title: Generate Completion Certificates
stories.description: As a learner, I want to receive a completion certificate so that I can prove my course achievement.

stories.title: Enroll in Courses
stories.description: As a learner, I want to enroll in courses so that I can access and start learning.

stories.title: View Dashboard with Progress
stories.description: As a learner, I want a dashboard showing enrolled courses and progress so that I can manage my learning.

summary: Build a minimum viable e-learning platform enabling instructors to create courses with lessons and quizzes, and learners to enroll, track progress, and earn certificates.
